casebody.data:
Edward BATTLE, Jr., Employee
v.
MEADOWBROOK MEAT COMPANY, INC., Employer, Self-Insured (Sedgwick Claims Management Services, Inc., Third-Party Administrator). No. 300P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Cedric R. Perry, Rocky Mount, for Battle, Edward (Jr.). Roy G. Pettigrew, Raleigh, for Meadowbrook Meat Company, Inc., et al. Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Raleigh, for Meadowbrook Meat Company, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th of August 2015 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Withdrawn by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
